title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.22 - Equal punishment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.22 - Equal punishment

State Regulations

If the violation within the State of any of the rules and
regulations set forth in this Part, would have been a felony, misdemeanor or
other punishable offense if committed on any public road, street, highway, or
turnpike, in the municipality in which such violation occurred, it shall be
tried and punished in the same manner as if it had been committed on such
public road, street, highway or turnpike. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
